pr_title: Prevent crash when updating buttons on Main Menu

timeline.message: Log storage migration state with crash
Always reload cursors when updating buttons to avoid cursors pointing at old database

timeline.bodyText: We don't need to keep any of this state in the Activity any longer.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: requery is deprecated. The advice is to just open a new cursor.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: startManagingCursor is deprecated. Instead of doing this I've switched it to using try-with-resource to manage opening/closing.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.message: Don't show fatal error if there is a DB error updating button counts
